description: Avantree Roxa is Bluetooth 4.0 audio receiver to enable non-Bluetooth hifi / home stereo system into a wireless Bluetooth one. It simple to use and incorporates the aptX codec for improved Bluetooth sound quality. Play music from your phone or tablet to your existing audio gear. Simply plug the Roxa into your audio gear via the 3.5mm jack or the included RCA cable. The Roxa does not have a battery so it can run continuous as it draws power from any AC socket. The Roxa will automatically re-connect with your phone or tablet when it comes within range so you can set it and forget it without having to push buttons. The integrated USB port outputs 1Amp that means it can charge iPhones, smartphones, GPS and more.
title: Avantree RC300Q Bluetooth 4.0 HD Speaker Adapter / Audio Receiver, aptX codec for HD quality sound - White/Green
